00098 
00099       SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( CURSOR_NORMAL );
00100 
00101       if( gMsgBox.BackRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_EXISTS )
00102       {
00103             return( 0 );

00105 
00106       // Based on style....
00107       switch( ubStyle )
00108       {
00109             //default
00110             case  MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE:
00111 
00112                   ubMercBoxBackground = DIALOG_MERC_POPUP_BACKGROUND;

00124                   ubMercBoxBackground = WHITE_MERC_POPUP_BACKGROUND;

00126

00192 
00193 
00194       if ( usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_USE_CENTERING_RECT && pCenteringRect != NULL )
00195       {
00196             aRect.iTop =      pCenteringRect->iTop;
00197             aRect.iLeft =     pCenteringRect->iLeft;
00198             aRect.iBottom =   pCenteringRect->iBottom;
00199             aRect.iRight =    pCenteringRect->iRight;
00200       }
00201       else
00202       {
00203             // Use default!
00204             aRect.iTop        =     0;
00205             aRect.iLeft       =     0;
00206             aRect.iBottom =   SCREEN_HEIGHT;

00210       // Set some values!
00211       gMsgBox.usFlags                     = usFlags;
00212       gMsgBox.uiExitScreen    = uiExitScreen;

00217       // Init message box
00218       gMsgBox.iBoxId = PrepareMercPopupBox( iId, ubMercBoxBackground, ubMercBoxBorder, (STR16)zString, MSGBOX_DEFAULT_WIDTH, 40, 10, 30, &usTextBoxWidth, &usTextBoxHeight );
00219 
00220       if( gMsgBox.iBoxId == -1 )
00221       {
00222             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION

00230       gMsgBox.usHeight = usTextBoxHeight;
00231 
00232       // Determine position ( centered in rect )
00233       gMsgBox.sX = (INT16)( ( ( ( aRect.iRight  - aRect.iLeft ) - usTextBoxWidth ) / 2 ) + aRect.iLeft );
00234       gMsgBox.sY = (INT16)( ( ( ( aRect.iBottom - aRect.iTop ) - usTextBoxHeight ) / 2 ) + aRect.iTop );
00235 
00236       if ( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )

00251 
00252       // Init save buffer
00253       vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_DEFAULT | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
00254       vs_desc.usWidth = usTextBoxWidth;
00255       vs_desc.usHeight = usTextBoxHeight;
00256       vs_desc.ubBitDepth = 16;
00257       
00258       if( AddVideoSurface( &vs_desc, &gMsgBox.uiSaveBuffer) == FALSE )
00259       {
00260             return( - 1 );
00261       }
00262 
00263   //Save what we have under here...
00264       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( gMsgBox.uiSaveBuffer, &uiDestPitchBYTES);

00266 
00267       Blt16BPPTo16BPP((UINT16 *)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
00268                         (UINT16 *)pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES,  
00269                         0 , 0, 
00270                         gMsgBox.sX , gMsgBox.sY, 
00271                         usTextBoxWidth, usTextBoxHeight );
00272 
00273       UnLockVideoSurface( gMsgBox.uiSaveBuffer );
00274       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
00275 
00276       // Create top-level mouse region
00277       MSYS_DefineRegion( &(gMsgBox.BackRegion), 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
00278                                      usCursor, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MsgBoxClickCallback ); 
00279 
00280       if( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_DONT_MOVE_MOUSE ] == FALSE )
00281       {
00282             if( usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK )
00283             {
00284                   SimulateMouseMovement( ( gMsgBox.sX + ( usTextBoxWidth / 2 ) + 27 ), ( gMsgBox.sY + ( usTextBoxHeight - 10 ) ) );
00285             }
00286             else
00287             {
00288                   SimulateMouseMovement( gMsgBox.sX + usTextBoxWidth / 2 , gMsgBox.sY + usTextBoxHeight - 4 );
00289             }
00290       }
00291 
00292       // Add region
00293       MSYS_AddRegion(&(gMsgBox.BackRegion) );
00294 
00295       // findout if cursor locked, if so, store old params and store, restore when done
00296       if( IsCursorRestricted() )

00298             fCursorLockedToArea = TRUE;

00300             FreeMouseCursor( );

00302

00486                                                                                            DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)YESMsgBoxCallback );

00541                                                                                            DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)ContractMsgBoxCallback );

00617                                                                                            DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)YESMsgBoxCallback );

00621

00627                                                                                            DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)NOMsgBoxCallback );
00628                   SetButtonCursor(gMsgBox.uiNOButton, usCursor);
00629                   ForceButtonUnDirty( gMsgBox.uiNOButton );
00630             }
00631 
00632       }
00633 
00634       InterruptTime();
00635       PauseGame();
00636       LockPauseState( 1 );
00637       // Pause timers as well....
00638       PauseTime( TRUE );
00639 
00640   // Save mouse restriction region...
00641   GetRestrictedClipCursor( &gOldCursorLimitRectangle );
00642   FreeMouseCursor( );
00643 
00644       gfNewMessageBox = TRUE;
00645 
00646       gfInMsgBox              = TRUE;
00647 
00648       return( iId );
00649 }

00652 void MsgBoxClickCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )

00660 
00661 void OKMsgBoxCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
00662 {
00663       static BOOLEAN fLButtonDown = FALSE;
00664 
00665       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00666       {
00667             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00668             fLButtonDown = TRUE;
00669       }
00670       else if( ( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP ) && fLButtonDown )
00671       {
00672             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00673 
00674             // OK, exit
00675             gMsgBox.bHandled = MSG_BOX_RETURN_OK;
00676       }
00677       else if ( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
00678       {
00679             fLButtonDown = FALSE;
00680       }
00681 
00682       
00683 }
00684 
00685 void YESMsgBoxCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
00686 {
00687       static BOOLEAN fLButtonDown = FALSE;
00688 
00689       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00690       {
00691             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00692             fLButtonDown = TRUE;
00693       }
00694       else if( ( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP ) && fLButtonDown )
00695       {
00696             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00697 
00698             // OK, exit
00699             gMsgBox.bHandled = MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES;
00700       }
00701       else if ( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
00702       {
00703             fLButtonDown = FALSE;
00704       }     
00705 }

00774 
00775 void NumberedMsgBoxCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
00776 {
00777       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00778       {
00779             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00780       }
00781       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP  )
00782       {
00783             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00784 
00785             // OK, exit
00786             gMsgBox.bHandled = (INT8) MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0);
00787       }
00788       
00789 }
00790 
00791 UINT32      ExitMsgBox( INT8 ubExitCode )
00792 {
00793       UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES, uiSrcPitchBYTES;
00794       UINT8  *pDestBuf, *pSrcBuf;
00795       SGPPoint pPosition;
00796 
00797       // Delete popup!
00798       RemoveMercPopupBoxFromIndex( gMsgBox.iBoxId );
00799       gMsgBox.iBoxId = -1;
00800 
00801       //Delete buttons!
00802       if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_FOUR_NUMBERED_BUTTONS )
00803       {
00804             RemoveButton( gMsgBox.uiButton[0] );
00805             RemoveButton( gMsgBox.uiButton[1] );
00806             RemoveButton( gMsgBox.uiButton[2] );
00807             RemoveButton( gMsgBox.uiButton[3] );
00808       }
00809       else
00810       {
00811             if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK )
00812             {
00813                   RemoveButton( gMsgBox.uiOKButton ); 
00814             }
00815 
00816             if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO )
00817             {
00818                   RemoveButton( gMsgBox.uiYESButton );      
00819                   RemoveButton( gMsgBox.uiNOButton ); 
00820             }
00821 
00822             if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_OKCONTRACT )
00823             {
00824                   RemoveButton( gMsgBox.uiYESButton );      
00825                   RemoveButton( gMsgBox.uiNOButton ); 
00826             }
00827 
00828             if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNOCONTRACT )
00829             {
00830                   RemoveButton( gMsgBox.uiYESButton );      
00831                   RemoveButton( gMsgBox.uiNOButton );
00832                   RemoveButton( gMsgBox.uiOKButton );
00833             }
00834 
00835             if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_GENERICCONTRACT )
00836             {
00837                   RemoveButton( gMsgBox.uiYESButton );      
00838                   RemoveButton( gMsgBox.uiNOButton );
00839                   RemoveButton( gMsgBox.uiOKButton );
00840             }
00841 
00842             if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_GENERIC )
00843             {
00844                   RemoveButton( gMsgBox.uiYESButton );      
00845                   RemoveButton( gMsgBox.uiNOButton );
00846             }
00847 
00848             if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNOLIE )
00849             {
00850                   RemoveButton( gMsgBox.uiYESButton );      
00851                   RemoveButton( gMsgBox.uiNOButton );
00852                   RemoveButton( gMsgBox.uiOKButton );
00853             }
00854 
00855             if( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_CONTINUESTOP )
00856             {
00857                   RemoveButton( gMsgBox.uiYESButton );      
00858                   RemoveButton( gMsgBox.uiNOButton );
00859             }
00860 
00861             if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_OKSKIP )
00862             {
00863                   RemoveButton( gMsgBox.uiYESButton );      
00864                   RemoveButton( gMsgBox.uiNOButton ); 
00865             }
00866 
00867       }
00868  
00869       // Delete button images
00870       UnloadButtonImage( gMsgBox.iButtonImages );
00871 
00872       // Unpause game....
00873       UnLockPauseState();
00874       UnPauseGame();
00875       // UnPause timers as well....
00876       PauseTime( FALSE );
00877 
00878   // Restore mouse restriction region...
00879   RestrictMouseCursor( &gOldCursorLimitRectangle );
00880 
00881 
00882       gfInMsgBox = FALSE;
00883 
00884       // Call done callback!
00885       if ( gMsgBox.ExitCallback != NULL )
00886       {
00887             (*(gMsgBox.ExitCallback))( ubExitCode );
00888       }
00889 
00890 
00891       //if ur in a non gamescreen and DONT want the msg box to use the save buffer, unset gfDontOverRideSaveBuffer in ur callback
00892       if( ( ( gMsgBox.uiExitScreen != GAME_SCREEN ) || ( fRestoreBackgroundForMessageBox == TRUE ) ) && gfDontOverRideSaveBuffer )
00893       {
00894             // restore what we have under here...
00895             pSrcBuf = LockVideoSurface( gMsgBox.uiSaveBuffer, &uiSrcPitchBYTES);
00896             pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
00897 
00898             Blt16BPPTo16BPP((UINT16 *)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
00899                               (UINT16 *)pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES,  
00900                               gMsgBox.sX , gMsgBox.sY, 
00901                               0, 0,
00902                               gMsgBox.usWidth, gMsgBox.usHeight );
00903 
00904             UnLockVideoSurface( gMsgBox.uiSaveBuffer );
00905             UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
00906 
00907             InvalidateRegion( gMsgBox.sX, gMsgBox.sY, (INT16)( gMsgBox.sX + gMsgBox.usWidth ), (INT16)( gMsgBox.sY + gMsgBox.usHeight ) );
00908       }
00909 
00910       fRestoreBackgroundForMessageBox = FALSE;
00911       gfDontOverRideSaveBuffer = TRUE;
00912 
00913       if( fCursorLockedToArea == TRUE )
00914       {
00915             GetMousePos( &pPosition );
00916 
00917             if( ( pPosition.iX > MessageBoxRestrictedCursorRegion.iRight ) || ( pPosition.iX > MessageBoxRestrictedCursorRegion.iLeft ) && ( pPosition.iY < MessageBoxRestrictedCursorRegion.iTop ) && ( pPosition.iY > MessageBoxRestrictedCursorRegion.iBottom ) )
00918             {
00919                   SimulateMouseMovement( pOldMousePosition.iX , pOldMousePosition.iY );
00920             }
00921 
00922             fCursorLockedToArea = FALSE;
00923             RestrictMouseCursor( &MessageBoxRestrictedCursorRegion );
00924       }
00925 
00926       // Remove region
00927       MSYS_RemoveRegion(&(gMsgBox.BackRegion) );
00928 
00929       // Remove save buffer!
00930       DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex( gMsgBox.uiSaveBuffer );
00931 
00932       
00933       switch( gMsgBox.uiExitScreen )
00934       {
00935             case GAME_SCREEN:
00936 
00937       if ( InOverheadMap( ) )
00938       {
00939         gfOverheadMapDirty = TRUE;
00940       }
00941       else
00942       {
00943                     SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00944       }
00945                   break;
00946             case MAP_SCREEN:
00947                   fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
00948                   break;
00949       }
00950 
00951   if ( gfFadeInitialized )
00952   {
00953     SetPendingNewScreen(FADE_SCREEN);
00954     return( FADE_SCREEN );
00955   }
00956 
00957       return( gMsgBox.uiExitScreen );
00958 }
00959 
00960 UINT32      MessageBoxScreenInit( )
00961 {
00962       return( TRUE );
00963 }
00964 
00965 
00966 UINT32      MessageBoxScreenHandle( )
00967 {
00968       InputAtom  InputEvent;
00969 
00970       if ( gfNewMessageBox )
00971       {
00972             // If in game screen....
00973             if ( ( gfStartedFromGameScreen )||( gfStartedFromMapScreen ) )
00974             {
00975                   //UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES, uiSrcPitchBYTES;
00976                   //UINT8      *pDestBuf, *pSrcBuf;
00977 
00978                   if( gfStartedFromGameScreen )
00979                   {
00980                         HandleTacticalUILoseCursorFromOtherScreen( );
00981                   }
00982                   else
00983                   {
00984                         HandleMAPUILoseCursorFromOtherScreen( );
00985                   }
00986 
00987                   gfStartedFromGameScreen = FALSE;
00988                   gfStartedFromMapScreen = FALSE;
00989 /*
00990                   // Save what we have under here...
00991                   pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( gMsgBox.uiSaveBuffer, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
00992                   pSrcBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiSrcPitchBYTES);
00993 
00994                   Blt16BPPTo16BPP((UINT16 *)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
00995                                     (UINT16 *)pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES,  
00996                                     0 , 0, 
00997                                     gMsgBox.sX , gMsgBox.sY, 
00998                                     gMsgBox.usWidth, gMsgBox.usHeight );
00999 
01000                   UnLockVideoSurface( gMsgBox.uiSaveBuffer );
01001                   UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
01002 */
01003             }
01004             
01005             gfNewMessageBox = FALSE;
01006 
01007             return( MSG_BOX_SCREEN );
01008       }
01009 
01010 
01011 
01012       UnmarkButtonsDirty( );
01013 
01014       // Render the box!
01015       if ( gMsgBox.fRenderBox )
01016       {
01017             if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_FOUR_NUMBERED_BUTTONS )
01018             {
01019                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiButton[0] );
01020                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiButton[1] );
01021                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiButton[2] );
01022                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiButton[3] );
01023             }
01024 
01025             if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK )
01026             {
01027                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiOKButton );   
01028             }
01029 
01030             if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_CANCEL )
01031             {
01032                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiOKButton );   
01033             }
01034 
01035             if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO )
01036             {
01037                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiYESButton );  
01038                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiNOButton );   
01039             }
01040 
01041             if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_OKCONTRACT )
01042             {
01043                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiYESButton );  
01044                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiNOButton );
01045             }
01046 
01047             if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNOCONTRACT )
01048             {
01049                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiYESButton );  
01050                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiNOButton );
01051                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiOKButton );
01052             }
01053 
01054             if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_GENERICCONTRACT )
01055             {
01056                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiYESButton );  
01057                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiNOButton );
01058                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiOKButton );
01059             }
01060 
01061             if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_GENERIC )
01062             {
01063                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiYESButton );  
01064                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiNOButton );
01065             }
01066 
01067             if( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_CONTINUESTOP )
01068             {
01069                   // Exit messagebox
01070                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiYESButton );  
01071                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiNOButton );
01072             }
01073 
01074             if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNOLIE )
01075             {
01076                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiYESButton );  
01077                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiNOButton );
01078                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiOKButton );
01079             }
01080 
01081             if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_OKSKIP )
01082             {
01083                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiYESButton );  
01084                   MarkAButtonDirty( gMsgBox.uiNOButton );
01085             }
01086 
01087 
01088             RenderMercPopUpBoxFromIndex( gMsgBox.iBoxId, gMsgBox.sX, gMsgBox.sY,  FRAME_BUFFER );
01089             //gMsgBox.fRenderBox = FALSE;
01090             // ATE: Render each frame...
01091       }
01092 
01093       // Render buttons
01094       RenderButtons( );
01095 
01096       EndFrameBufferRender( );
01097 
01098       // carter, need key shortcuts for clearing up message boxes
01099       // Check for esc 
01100       while (DequeueEvent(&InputEvent) == TRUE)
01101   {
01102       if( InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_UP )
01103                   {
01104                         if( ( InputEvent.usParam == ESC ) || ( InputEvent.usParam == 'n') )
01105                         { 
01106           if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO )
01107           {
01108                                 // Exit messagebox
01109                                 gMsgBox.bHandled = MSG_BOX_RETURN_NO;   
01110           }
01111                         }
01112 
01113                         if( InputEvent.usParam == ENTER ) 
01114                         { 
01115                               if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO )
01116                               {
01117                                     // Exit messagebox
01118                                     gMsgBox.bHandled = MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES;
01119                               }
01120                               else if( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK )
01121                               {
01122                                     // Exit messagebox
01123                                     gMsgBox.bHandled = MSG_BOX_RETURN_OK;
01124                               }
01125                               else if( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_CONTINUESTOP )
01126                               {
01127                                     // Exit messagebox
01128                                     gMsgBox.bHandled = MSG_BOX_RETURN_OK;
01129                               }
01130                         }
01131                         if( InputEvent.usParam == 'o' )
01132                         {
01133                               if( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK )
01134                               {
01135                                     // Exit messagebox
01136                                     gMsgBox.bHandled = MSG_BOX_RETURN_OK;
01137                               }
01138                         }
01139                         if( InputEvent.usParam == 'y' )
01140                         {
01141                               if( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO )
01142                               {
01143                                     // Exit messagebox
01144                                     gMsgBox.bHandled = MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES;
01145                               }
01146                         }
01147                         if( InputEvent.usParam == '1' )
01148                         {
01149                               if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_FOUR_NUMBERED_BUTTONS )
01150                               {
01151                                     // Exit messagebox
01152                                     gMsgBox.bHandled = 1;
01153                               }
01154                         }
01155                         if( InputEvent.usParam == '2' )
01156                         {
01157                               if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_FOUR_NUMBERED_BUTTONS )
01158                               {
01159                                     // Exit messagebox
01160                                     gMsgBox.bHandled = 1;
01161                               }
01162                         }
01163                         if( InputEvent.usParam == '3' )
01164                         {
01165                               if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_FOUR_NUMBERED_BUTTONS )
01166                               {
01167                                     // Exit messagebox
01168                                     gMsgBox.bHandled = 1;
01169                               }
01170                         }
01171                         if( InputEvent.usParam == '4' )
01172                         {
01173                               if ( gMsgBox.usFlags & MSG_BOX_FLAG_FOUR_NUMBERED_BUTTONS )
01174                               {
01175                                     // Exit messagebox
01176                                     gMsgBox.bHandled = 1;
01177                               }
01178                         }
01179 
01180                   }
01181       }
01182 
01183   if ( gMsgBox.bHandled )
01184       {
01185             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
01186             return( ExitMsgBox( gMsgBox.bHandled ) );
01187       }
01188 
01189       return( MSG_BOX_SCREEN );
01190 }

01193 {
01194       return( FALSE );
01195 }

01198 // a basic box that don't care what screen we came from
01199 template void DoScreenIndependantMessageBox<unsigned short *>(unsigned short *, UINT16, MSGBOX_CALLBACK);
01200 template void DoScreenIndependantMessageBox<unsigned short const *>(unsigned short const *, UINT16, MSGBOX_CALLBACK);
01201 template <typename string1>
01202 void DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( string1 zString, UINT16 usFlags, MSGBOX_CALLBACK ReturnCallback )
01203 {
01204       SGPRect CenteringRect= {0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, INV_INTERFACE_START_Y };
01205       DoScreenIndependantMessageBoxWithRect( (INT16 *) zString, usFlags, ReturnCallback, &CenteringRect );
01206 }
01207 
01208 // a basic box that don't care what screen we came from
01209 void DoUpperScreenIndependantMessageBox( INT16 *zString, UINT16 usFlags, MSGBOX_CALLBACK ReturnCallback )
01210 {
01211       SGPRect CenteringRect= {0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, INV_INTERFACE_START_Y / 2 };
01212       DoScreenIndependantMessageBoxWithRect( zString, usFlags, ReturnCallback, &CenteringRect );
01213 }
01214 
01215 // a basic box that don't care what screen we came from
01216 void DoLowerScreenIndependantMessageBox( UINT16 * zString, UINT16 usFlags, MSGBOX_CALLBACK ReturnCallback )
01217 {
01218       SGPRect CenteringRect= {0, INV_INTERFACE_START_Y / 2, SCREEN_WIDTH, INV_INTERFACE_START_Y };
01219       DoScreenIndependantMessageBoxWithRect( (INT16 *)zString, usFlags, ReturnCallback, &CenteringRect );
01220 }
01221 
01222 
01223 void DoScreenIndependantMessageBoxWithRect( INT16 *zString, UINT16 usFlags, MSGBOX_CALLBACK ReturnCallback, SGPRect *pCenteringRect )
01224 {
01225 
01226       /// which screen are we in?
01227 
01228       // Map Screen (excluding AI Viewer)
01229 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01230       if ( (guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) && ( guiCurrentScreen != AIVIEWER_SCREEN ) )
01231 #else
01232       if ( (guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
01233 #endif
01234       {
01235 
01236             // auto resolve is a special case
01237             if( guiCurrentScreen == AUTORESOLVE_SCREEN )
01238             {
01239                   DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zString, AUTORESOLVE_SCREEN, usFlags, ReturnCallback, pCenteringRect );
01240             }
01241             else
01242             {
01243                   // set up for mapscreen
01244                   DoMapMessageBoxWithRect( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zString, MAP_SCREEN, usFlags, ReturnCallback, pCenteringRect );
01245             }
01246       }
01247 
01248       //Laptop
01249       else if( guiCurrentScreen == LAPTOP_SCREEN )
01250       {
01251             // set up for laptop
01252             DoLapTopSystemMessageBoxWithRect( MSG_BOX_LAPTOP_DEFAULT, zString, LAPTOP_SCREEN, usFlags, ReturnCallback, pCenteringRect );
01253       }
01254 
01255       //Save Load Screen
01256       else if( guiCurrentScreen == SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN )
01257       {
01258             DoSaveLoadMessageBoxWithRect( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zString, SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN, usFlags, ReturnCallback, pCenteringRect );
01259       }
01260 
01261       //Options Screen
01262       else if( guiCurrentScreen == OPTIONS_SCREEN )
01263       {
01264             DoOptionsMessageBoxWithRect( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zString, OPTIONS_SCREEN, usFlags, ReturnCallback, pCenteringRect );
01265       }
01266 
01267       // Tactical
01268       else if( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
01269       {
01270             DoMessageBox(  MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zString,  guiCurrentScreen, usFlags,  ReturnCallback,  pCenteringRect );
01271       }
01272 }

01274 UINT16 GetMSgBoxButtonWidth( INT32 iButtonImage )
01275 {
01276       return( GetWidthOfButtonPic( (UINT16)iButtonImage, ButtonPictures[iButtonImage].OnNormal ) );
01277 }
